known_issues: Time control slider in meditation page drags in reverse (right drag moves left)
Back button missing/invisible in meditation page
Save Ritual and Begin Meditation buttons have mismatched dimensions

existing_features.title: Restore the back button in the meditation page to be visible in the same position as it appears in the pre-meditation page, maintaining the same styling and behavior
In the pre-meditation page, make the 'Begin Meditation' button match the exact height and width dimensions of the 'Save Ritual' button

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix the time control slider in the meditation page so that dragging right increases the time value and dragging left decreases it (normal slider behavior)

projectName: Fix meditation page slider behavior, restore back button, and match button dimensions
